level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor shall issue rules to implement the provisions of section 16-2309(b), section 16-2310.01, section 16-2311(b)(1), and section 16-2311.01 within 90 days from August 13, 1986. These rules shall be submitted for a 30-day period of review by the Council of the District of Columbia, excluding Saturdays, Sundays, holidays, and days that pass during Council recess.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-140
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-140, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-2310.01.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 6-140, see Mayor's Order 86-192, October 27, 1986.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 28(c)(3) of D.C. Law 15-354 provided that the section designation of § 16-2311.1 of the District of Columbia Official Code is redesignated as § 16-2311.01.
